state: You are now playing a exciting round of TextWorld! Here is your task for today. First off, if it's not too much trouble, I need you to head south. Next, move west. If you can get around to doing that, make an attempt to head west. Then, go to the west. And then, try to go west. Following that, make an effort to venture north. Once you get around to doing that, venture north. And then, make an attempt to head north. Then, make an effort to take a trip east. If you can succeed at that, go to the south. And then, try to go south. After that, try to go to the east. And then, move north. Okay, and then, lift the durian from the floor of the shower. That's it! -= Steam Room =- You've entered a steam room. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Steam Room =-0/1
